description: Representation of a ticket request for a single company based on the colour/size dependent global trade item number (GTIN-14) of the product.

gtin.description: The global trade item number (GTIN-14 or GTIN-13 with leading zero)

barcodeWithSellingPrice.description: This flag indicates if the selling price should be printed within the barcode

creationTimestamp.description: user defined timestamp at which the request was created by the ticket provider
